text:
Is doing nothing when using `@inbounds` before a function expected behavior?
```julia> function f()
           x = [1,2,3]
           @inbounds x[4]
       end;
julia> @inbounds function g()
           x = [1,2,3]
           x[4]
       end;
julia> f()
0
julia> g()
ERROR: BoundsError: attempt to access 3-element Vector{Int64} at index [4]```

elements.text:
julia> function f()
           x = [1,2,3]
           @inbounds x[4]
       end;
julia> @inbounds function g()
           x = [1,2,3]
           x[4]
       end;
julia> f()
0
julia> g()
ERROR: BoundsError: attempt to access 3-element Vector{Int64} at index [4]

text:
Looks like this has been asked before and is an open issue
<https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/13234>
